title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Skills: Multi-session Library Education Model for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will independently search for and evaluate credible resources in academic science databases through five sessions.
Learners will create research project proposals utilizing library electronic resources.
Learners will present research findings while adhering to information ethics (e.g., citation, plagiarism prevention).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
